<title level="1" right="Action">[Wicked Thorns](/Actions.aspx?ID=1449) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 36</row>

**Frequency** once per day

**Trigger** You're hit with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike or a Strike with a non-[reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) melee weapon.

</column>

---

Several of your thorns break off and hook into your attacker's body. You deal 1d8 piercing damage to the triggering creature. It attempts a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, the creature also takes 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) as your thorns embed in its flesh.

 At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent piercing damage increases by 1.
name: Wicked Thorns
